snippet: Mike D’Antoni resigned Wednesday after less than two seasons as the Lakers head coach, walking away from the one year and $4 million left on his contract.
abstract: Mike D’Antoni resigns after less than two seasons as Los Angeles Lakers head coach, walking away from one year and $4 million left on his contract.
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni resigned Wednesday after less than two seasons as the Lakers head coach, walking away from the one year and $4 million left on his contract.
